meanings.definition: To give a particular style or character to something.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys stylizing her drawings with colorful patterns.
meanings.sent2: The interior designer is skilled at stylizing homes to match the clients' preferences.
meanings.sent3: The artist had fun stylizing the portrait with exaggerated features.
meanings.sent4: Her unique way of stylizing landscapes brings them to life on canvas.
meanings.sent5: Stylizing the room with vintage decor created a cozy atmosphere.

meanings.definition: To make something conform to a particular style.
meanings.sent1: He is stylizing the website to reflect the company's branding.
meanings.sent2: The tailor is stylizing the dress to fit the latest fashion trends.
meanings.sent3: The chef was caught stylizing the dish with an unexpected twist.
meanings.sent4: By stylizing the text, the designer ensured consistency across all marketing materials.
meanings.sent5: Stylizing the garden with modern sculptures added a touch of elegance.
